reviews.review: One of the few games that rewards skill and nothing else

O jogo eh o meu favorito, mas, apesar disso, apresenta varias coisas que me deixam maluco, como bans injustos (por exemplo, seus amigos te expulsarem e voce acaba tomando ban), hackers (apesar do numero deles terem diminuido mto) etc

Se voce ta procurando um jogo multiplayer, bom, "gratis" e fps, esse eh um bom jogo, mas saiba que voce vai passar bastante raiva
Hileci orospu çocuğu kaynıyor siktiğimin oyunu.
excelente juego aunque un poco confuso al inicio

Clásico de clásicos. Uno juega y nunca deja de sorprenderse, tanto por los jugadores tóxicos, los amigables y aquellos que hacen jugadas extremadamente buenas que no podes evitar aplaudir y escribir por el chat general de la partida lo sorprendente que son.
Como siempre recomendado, un 8/10, porque a veces la toxicidad hace que uno se embronque y tenga que jugar con BOTS en el equipo, los cuales a veces son mejores que un jugador que solo quiere molestar.

It used to be a very good game. 
Matchmaking:
(this part is about matchmaking, esea and faceit are a different story)

There were occasional hackers and smurfs in low level matchmaking. Now because of the game being free, the game is completely ruined. The ranking system is a disaster, you cannot progress in match making due to low trust factor, hackers, smurfs, brand new players and trolls who gave up on the game but for whatever reason continue to play and ruin the game for others. NA servers are also more likely to be filled with Spanish only speaking South Americans or Europeans????

Face it and ESEA:

Add a great way to play the game with somewhat serious players and a very good anti cheat. Unlike Matchmaking if you lose to a proven cheater then you are refunded lost mr. Community is good.
Good game has problems with cheaters
i only recommend this game if your going get the one were you have to buy it as the free version has alot of hackers so buy it its a good game
